snippet: Jim Edward Lowery slipped out of leg shackles and used them to break the window of a patrol car that was transferring him to a local jail, officials said.
lead_paragraph: Jim Edward Lowery slipped out of leg shackles and used them to break the window of a patrol car that was transferring him to a local jail, officials said.

headline.main: Georgia Prisoner Accused of Killing Sheriff Is Caught After Escape
